channel.title: LoZ Razor Blade (practice)
channel.description:
i saw a post of Vex's and he called it a Razor Blade and that instantly took me back to Majora's Mask. (Legend of Zelda Game) and they had a sword in it called the Razor Blade aswell so here it is a simple 30 minute job using nothing but prims and the bevel and extrude tool a few times enjoy :D :D
Oh and constructive criticisms are encouraged (and i didnt get the color sceme quite exact but im sure its close [IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/Lodrswordfrntwire.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/Lodrswordfrnt.jpg[/img]
